amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to ensure grazing is one of the hazardous fuels reduction activities authorized by the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
